resources.name: eBird
resources.description: Global bird observation platform with millions of sightings and photos
resources.description_zh: 全球鸟类观察平台，包含数百万条观察记录和照片

resources.name: iNaturalist
resources.description: Community-driven nature observation platform for identifying and sharing wildlife
resources.description_zh: 社区驱动的自然观察平台，用于识别和分享野生动物

resources.name: Butterflies of America
resources.description: Comprehensive butterfly identification guide with photos and distribution maps
resources.description_zh: 全面的蝴蝶识别指南，包含照片和分布地图

resources.name: All About Birds (Cornell Lab)
resources.description: Comprehensive bird guide with photos, sounds, and identification tips
resources.description_zh: 全面的鸟类指南，包含照片、声音和识别技巧

resources.name: Nature Photography Tips
resources.description: Expert tips for photographing birds and butterflies in the wild
resources.description_zh: 野外拍摄鸟类和蝴蝶的专业技巧

resources.name: Audubon Bird Guide
resources.description: Free bird identification app with photos, sounds, and range maps
resources.description_zh: 免费的鸟类识别应用，包含照片、声音和分布地图

resources.name: Butterfly Conservation
resources.description: UK-based organization with butterfly identification guides and conservation information
resources.description_zh: 英国组织，提供蝴蝶识别指南和保护信息

resources.name: Macau Biodiversity Database
resources.name_zh: 澳门生物多样性数据库
resources.description: Local biodiversity database with species information and observation records
resources.description_zh: 本地生物多样性数据库，包含物种信息和观察记录

resources.name: Hong Kong Bird Watching Society
resources.description: Local bird watching organization with guides and observation sites
resources.description_zh: 本地观鸟组织，提供指南和观察地点

resources.name: National Geographic Photography
resources.description: Professional wildlife photography tips and techniques
resources.description_zh: 专业的野生动物摄影技巧和技术

resources.name: Xeno-canto
resources.description: Database of bird sounds from around the world

resources.name: Butterfly Identification Guide
resources.description: Comprehensive guide to identifying butterflies by region and characteristics
resources.description_zh: 按地区和特征识别蝴蝶的综合指南
